abstract.p: Weekly listing of recent residential sales in New York City and metropolitan area; photos; mortgage rate graphs (M)

block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.
MANHATTAN
CHELSEA 532 West 22nd Street (Eagle)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 2,254-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar building; dining area, renovated kitchen, fireplace; common charge $735; taxes $14,892; listed at $1.7 million, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman)
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.
MANHATTAN
CHELSEA 532 West 22nd Street (Eagle)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 2,254-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar building; dining area, renovated kitchen, fireplace; common charge $735; taxes $14,892; listed at $1.7 million, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman)

CLINTON 348 West 38th Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; keyed elevator, 12-ft. ceilings, oversize windows, h/w floors, Hudson River view; maintenance $864, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $495,000 (multiple bids), 6 weeks on market (Brokers: Stribling, Wells & Gay; Eychner Associates)

GREENWICH VILLAGE 250 Mercer Street (Great Jones St.) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; concierge, renovated kitchen and bath, high ceiling; h/w floors; maintenance $1,500, 63% tax-deductible; listed at $650,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Halstead Property Co.)

UPPER EAST SIDE 304 East 65th Street 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 1,541-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, renovated kitchen, marble baths, 3 exposures; common charge $1,156; taxes $8,700; listed at $899,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Bellmarc)

UPPER WEST SIDE 253 West 73rd Street (Level Club) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, renovated kitchen, oversize windows, h/w floors, 2 exposures; common charge $548; taxes $3,684; listed at $649,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)
BRONX

CITY ISLAND 6 Leeward Lane (Boatyard) 2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,650-sq.-ft. duplex condo in a postwar building; dining room, eat-in kitchen, balcony, fireplace, c/a, boat mooring; common charge $550; taxes $1,800; listed at $300,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Jacqueline Kyle Kall)

RIVERDALE 3409 Corlear Avenue 2-family, 60-year-old semiattached house; 2 bedrooms, 2 baths, eat-in kitchen in each unit; finished basement, 2-car garage, 32-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,800; listed at $309,000, 6 weeks on market (Broker: McDonagh Properties)
BROOKLYN

BROOKLYN HEIGHTS 55 Pineapple Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 725-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; elevator, dining area; maintenance $672, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $269,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group Brooklyn)

PARK SLOPE 151 Berkeley Place 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,250-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; dining area, den, skylight in kitchen, high ceilings, parquet floors, original moldings and detail; maintenance $355, 35% tax-deductible; listed at $459,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Warren Lewis Realty)

WINDSOR TERRACE 459 17th Street 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 99-year-old brick house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, 4 decorative mantels, pine floors, 16.8-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $995; listed at $325,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: John P. Noonan)
QUEENS

REGO PARK CRESCENT 65-42 Ellwell Crescent 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 50-year-old detached brick house; dining room, family room, finished basement, private driveway, c/a, 60-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,780; listed at $449,000, 1 week on market (Broker: ReMax F.H.)
STATEN ISLAND

OAKWOOD 98 Leeds Street 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 71-year-old brick ranch; dining room, oak floors, finished basement, fireplace, new roof and windows, 35-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,505; listed at $259,900, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Kingsley)
WESTCHESTER

HASTINGS-ON-HUDSON 2 Bellair Drive 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 77-year-old colonial; covered front porch, fireplace, dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, patio, marble master bath; 50-by-173-ft. lot; taxes $13,143; listed at $689,000 (multiple bids); 1 week on market (Broker: Houlihan/Lawrence)

KATONAH 32 Ridge Street 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 52-year-old Cape Cod; entry hall, fireplace, eat-in kitchen, dining room, sitting room, hardwood floors, attached garage; 0.30-acre lot; taxes $3,345; listed at $349,000; 6 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker; Houlihan/ Lawrence)

MOUNT KISCO 63 Old Wagon Road 4-bedroom, 4-bath, 40-year-old raised ranch; lake frontage, pond, dock, stone fireplace, solarium, patio, library, family room, 2-car garage, 6 1/2-acre lot; taxes $21,676; listed at $2.195 million; 11 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker; Houlihan/Lawrence)
LONG ISLAND

FORT SALONGA 45 Brookfield Road 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 47-year-old ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, great room, finished basement, 2-car garage, 2-acre lot; taxes $8,200; listed at $529,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Anastasio)

GLEN COVE 19 Townsend Road 5-bedroom, 3-bath, 43-year-old ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, finished basement, fireplace, pool, 1-car attached garage, 125-by-200-ft. lot; taxes $10,000; listed at $549,000, 25 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker Sammis; Daniel Gale Associates)

GREAT NECK 2 William Penn Road 4-bedroom, 3-bath, 60-year-old Tudor; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, finished basement, fireplace, 2-car attached garage, 100-by-90-ft. lot; taxes $11,000; listed at $725,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Trylon)

ROSLYN HEIGHTS 60 Pinetree Lane 5-bedroom, 2-bath, 51-year-old expanded ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, fireplace, 1-car attached garage, 65-by-120-ft. lot; taxes $5,700; listed at $335,000, 1 week on market (Brokers: Atanas; Sterling)

CONNECTICUT DARIEN 30 Maple Street 5-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 45-year-old colonial; entry foyer, dining room, solarium, breakfast nook, family room, fireplace, 0.58-acre lot; taxes $4,911; listed at $619,000, 12 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)

STAMFORD 9 Diamond Crest Lane 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 47-year-old ranch; dining room, family room, fireplace, rear deck, c/a, 2-car garage, 0.46-acre lot; taxes $4,775; listed at $362,000, 6 weeks on market (Brokers: Advantage Real Estate; Coldwell Banker/Greeenwich)

WESTPORT 16 Mills Street 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 70-year-old Cape Cod; dining room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, porch, 1-car garage, 0.18-acre lot; taxes $3,031; listed at $389,000, 6 weeks on market (Broker: William Pitt)

WILTON 61 Mayflower Drive 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 26-year-old contemporary ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, den, darkroom, fireplace, rear deck, screened porch, 2-car garage, 2-acre lot; taxes $6,407; listed at $515,000, 2 weeks on market (Brokers: Realty Seven/Wilton; Brotherhood & Higley)
NEW JERSEY

BERGENFIELD 31 Spring Avenue 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 60-year-old colonial; eat-in kitchen, dining room, full basement, 1-car garage, 108-by-200-ft.lot; taxes $7,946; listed at $185,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Atlantic Real Estate/Better Homes and Gardens)

FREEHOLD TOWNSHIP 156 Dutch Lane Road 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 21-year-old ranch; eat-in kitchen, fireplace, deck, screened porch, 2-car garage, 1.14-acre lot; taxes $4,064; listed at $269,000, (multiple bids), 21 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential New Jersey)

UPPER SADDLE RIVER 11 Old Chimney Road 5-bedroom, 3-bath, 40-year-old Cape Cod; fireplace, c/a, greenhouse, 2-car garage, 0.9-acre lot; taxes $7,319; listed at $549,000, 5 days on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker)
